name: Aoe-for-ios
tagline: Age of Empires ported to iOS
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
![screen](http://i.imgur.com/J8e4wNu.jpg)
![screen2](http://i.imgur.com/GdpVtzG.jpg)
![screen3](http://i.imgur.com/GdpVtzG.jpg)

To install this game on a device you require an Apple Developer license or a jailbroken phone.  

```
$ git clone : https://github.com/Danm72/AOE-for-iOS.git
```
This clone can be preformed in Xcode, and the project will be setup by the IDE.   
The project can be deployed to a choice of device or simulator 



![deploy](http://i.imgur.com/b1cN7Rp.png)
![deploy2](http://i.imgur.com/O7vXitC.png)

### WHY!?

This project was created as a learning exercise, and to encourage others with the same area of interest to think big.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
